title: ‘Southern Charm’ Reunion Part 1, ‘Salt Lake City’ Episode 2, and ‘Beverly Hills’ Finale
description:
Rachel Lindsay and Callie Curry begin this week’s 'Morally Corrupt' by recapping Part 1 of the ‘Southern Charm’ Season 8 reunion (2:55), before Rachel is joined by Jodi Walker to chat about Season 3, Episode 2 of ‘The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City’ (27:33). Then, Rachel and Jodi break down the Season 12 finale of ‘The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills’ (48:21).
Host: Rachel Lindsay
Guest: Callie Curry and Jodi Walker
Producers: Devon Manze
Theme Song: Devon Renaldo
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
